title: Skullgirls Tier List
description: Discover the most comprehensive Skullgirls tier list, ranking characters from S Tier to C Tier. Explore which fighters dominate the battlefield and why they're ranked as such.
heading: Skullgirls Tier List
introText: Discover the most comprehensive Skullgirls tier list, ranking characters from S Tier to C Tier. Explore which fighters dominate the battlefield and why they're ranked as such.

data.itemDescription: With exceptional speed and versatile combos, Valentine dominates with a strong mix of offensive and defensive abilities
A powerhouse with unpredictable attacks, Double can adapt to nearly any fight, making her a high-tier threat
Known for her excellent zoning abilities and powerful projectiles, Parasoul can keep opponents at bay while controlling the battlefield
A balanced character with strong mobility and mix-ups, Filia is great for aggressive play but lacks some defensive options
A grappler with devastating throws and high damage potential, Cerebella can be deadly in close combat but has trouble closing the gap against ranged characters
Offering good combo potential and mix-ups, Ms. Fortune is a decent all-rounder, but she can be outplayed by more mobile or powerful characters
While her zoning and projectiles can be annoying, Peacock struggles when opponents close the distance, making her vulnerable in fast-paced matches
Although Beowulf can deal decent damage, his limited range and predictable attacks make him a less viable choice compared to other fighters
